channel.title: DragonVale
channel.description:
Now I just started playing this app yesterday and when I saw a bone dragon I was so mad it cost 25 gems, so I was wondering if people can add me on gamecenter, so I can get a bone dragon. If you add me I'll also give you a daily gem.
My gamecenter name is: [RAIN]MrFun
If you want post your gamecenter in reply to this topic, so other people people can do the same.

item.title: DragonVale
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:6, topic:464703”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=568793.msg4148105#msg4148105 date=1352296774]

IAPCracker, that’s all I got to say bro.

I don’t have a jailbroken ipod

What you mean? I have no clue what that is
[/quote]

If you’re jailbroken, go onto cydia and get IAPCracker, might need to add a resource but yeah.[/quote]

Read full topic
